text: Dalimil Klapka (22 May 1933 â€“ 14 June 2022) was a Czech actor and dubber. He was born in Prague, Czech Republic. His career began in the 1960s and he dubbed Lieutenant Columbo in the Czech version of Columbo, Abe Simpson in The Simpsons and Yoda in Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back. Also also voiced the Beggar in the Czech animated movie Goat Story and its sequel. Klapka died on 14 June 2022 at a Prague hospital from prostate cancer, aged 89. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Czech movie actors Category:Czech television actors Category:Voice actors Category:Actors from Prague Category:Czech stage actors Category:Cancer deaths in the Czech Republic Category:Deaths from prostate cancer
title: Dalimil Klapka
